Name: worker_availability_constraint
Description: Only assign tasks to available workers

Name: role_competence_requirement
Description: Task must match required role competence

Name: skill_match_requirement
Description: Worker must have required skill level for task

Name: sprint_capacity_limit
Description: Total effort in sprint must not exceed team capacity

Name: product_owner_workload
Description: One Product Owner manages only one project

Name: scrum_master_support_limit
Description: One Scrum Master supports at most two teams

Name: feature_priority_requirement
Description: Only high-priority features included in next sprint

Name: user_story_estimation_required
Description: All user stories must have story points assigned

Name: task_deadline_compliance
Description: Task end date must be before sprint end

Name: team_size_requirement
Description: Team must have at least 5 members for full functionality

Name: documentation_must_exist
Description: Each feature must have associated documentation
